Paragraph: CIN developed 4 . 5 - times more frequently in patients with cancer who had undergone recent chemotherapy .

| --- |

| chemotherapy | (This is a treatment modality that involves the use of chemicals to destroy or inhibit the growth of cells. It is a valid chemical entity in this context.) |
